description: Write down decimal expansion of Pi; divide up into chunks of minimal length so that chunks are increasing numbers and do not begin with 0.
comments: "Slices of pi" sequence - _Michael Joseph Halm_, Aug 02 2002
prog: (PARI) default(realprecision,1000);P=Pi;until(P-=L=P\1,print1(L",");while((L>P*=10)||frac(P)<.1,)) \\ NB: The last line of printed values may not be accurate, double-check with higher precision. - _M. F. Hasler_, May 11 2015
author: _Robert G. Wilson v_
extensions: More terms from Larry Reeves (larryr(AT)acm.org), Oct 04 2001
Some more terms from _M. F. Hasler_, May 11 2015
